abstract: Saudi state television reports that interior minister Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz has been named heir to the throne after the death of Crown Prince Sultan.
snippet: State television reported Thursday that Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, the tough-talking interior minister, had been named heir to the Saudi throne after the death of the Crown Prince Sultan last week.
lead_paragraph: State television reported Thursday that Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, the tough-talking interior minister, had been named heir to the Saudi throne after the death of the Crown Prince Sultan last week.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Conservative Prince Is Appointed Heir to the Throne
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Conservative Prince Is Appointed Heir to the Throne
headline.seo: Saudi Arabia: Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz Is Appointed Heir to the Throne
